name: Rick and Morty: Phygital Computer Game
name_original: Rick and Morty: Phygital Computer Game
description:
What can you do with banana, AR marker and web camera? Yesterday you could do nothing. BUT! Since today you can download fan game, based on Rick and Morty universe, and play with some kind of old lovely Duck Hunt mechaniks (see trailer video). It's non-commerctial and free, just have fun with it. If you like it, it will be great if you subscribe my twitter and itch.io account.

Rick and Morty is created by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon for Adult Swim. Images, characters and logo are used without claim of ownership and belong to their respective owners.
